The diameter of the desktop is known to be N_0, and the distance from the desktop to the ground is N_1. If the bulb is N_2 from the ground, the area of ​​the shaded part on the ground is ()
raw_answer: 解:构造几何模型如图:依题意知DE=1.2米,FG=1米,AG=3米,由△DAE∽△BAC得\frac{DE}{BC}=\frac{AF}{AG},即\frac{1.2}{BC}=\frac{3-1}{3},得BC=1.8,故S圆=(\frac{1}{2}BC)^{2}•π=(\frac{1.8}{2})^{2}•π=0.81π,故选:B．
